s22.message:
Removed warning displayed when Adblock or Filterset.G are installed (both have a negligible
    install base by now)

s9.message: Clicking the icon will now open menu by default (old behavior can be restored by changing extensions.adblockplus.defaulttoolbaraction preference)

s1.message: The following lists the major changes compared to Adblock Plus 1.2.2.

s7.message:
Links to documentation on adblockplus.org will automatically open in user's language
    if available

s6.message: Image maps can now be blocked from context menu like regular images (bug 16605)

s5.message: Added an issue reporter allowing to send reports about Adblock Plus issues on web pages ("Report issue on this page" in ABP icon's menu, forum topic)

s4.message: Removed unmaintained translations: Indonesian, Malay, Brasilian Portuguese

s13.message: Selecting "Open in New Tab" from context menu will open multiple tabs if multiple items are selected (forum topic)

s23.message:
Made sure that the buttons aren't too far below subscription selection when opened in
    browser after first installation

s26.message:
Triggering a filter subscription update manually always downloads the file, even if
    server claims that it didn't change

s11.message: Disabled filters and filter subscriptions are no longer counted in the tooltip

s27.message:
No longer storing user's choice to collapse a subscription for subscriptions that have been
    removed

s19.message: Suggestions no longer distinguish between protocols (forum topic)

s38.message: Changed the way Adblock Plus stores its data to improve performance and memory use

s35.message:
Filter subscriptions added by other extensions will no longer persist, need to be added
    again on each browser start (ensures that these subscriptions don't stay around if the
    corresponding extension is uninstalled)

s10.message: First item in menu is the new issue reporter (forum topic)

s31.message: Removed separation between background images and "regular" images, $background and $image options are identical now (reliably distinguishing the two is no longer possible)

s16.message: Fixed: Scrolling to selected item broken in Firefox 4

s15.message: Tooltip now shows info on disabled filters as well (forum topic)

s14.message: Document source column shows whether the request was made to a first-party or third-party location, filtering and sorting by this information is possible (forum topic)

s20.message: A warning is displayed if a custom pattern no longer matches the address it is supposed to block (forum topic)

s33.message:
Added file default/patterns.ini to the extension, can be changed to define default filters
    or filter subscriptions for new users

s32.message: Made sure that filters added by other extensions like Element Hiding Helper are always enabled (forum topic)

s30.message: Improved implementation, made it cleaner and more modular (also changed the way how other extensions should access Adblock Plus)

s25.message: A snail icon is displayed for slow filters (was previously an exclamation mark, forum topic)

s44.message: Added precautions for the case that computer's clock is skewed

s45.message: Last modification time is reset now when a subscription redirects to a new location

s40.message: Reduced time required to set up element hiding on browser startup

s41.message: Using a more efficient approach to preference management now

s43.message: Using better algorithm to determine when to download subscriptions (blog post)

s29.message: Dropped support for Firefox 3.0, Songbird 1.8 and Midbrowser

s36.message:
Removed code importing preferences and filters from Adblock and Adblock Plus 0.5 (both have
    a negligible install base by now)
